title: [Large-scale] IVR-Based Advanced Business Language Communication Design

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic business language in corporate settings and leadership experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a non-real-time environment without face-to-face instruction, utilizing a smartphone-based IVR system

learning_goals: Learners can appropriately utilize advanced language expressions in three or more complex business scenarios through IVR simulation
Learners can complete differentiated interactive tasks provided in IVR environments with an 80%+ success rate
Learners can develop two or more communication strategies applicable to real workplace settings based on collaborative experiences in virtual spaces

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
